attributes.action: Call for an general election and let the British public decide who THEY want to govern the country!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's about time we took control of our country. Labour have done nothing but run the UK in to the ground! 

Now they can see that the end is nigh they are hell bent on making such a mess that the next government in charge will have too much to clean up! 

This is not what govenrments are for and as such it is time for them to go and for the UK to get up and dust itself off!

Lets call an election now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
